ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 26
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It IS available in the library in Erudin, that s where I bought mine. It s on the third floor. I didn t find much use for this spell however, except I want
ygData.messageBody:
On Sat, 24 Apr 1999, Gooey Smalls wrote:
> As for Wizard spells the library and tower of the
> crimson hands in Erudin have a HUGE selction of spells, in fact the only
> spell i have'nt found is eye of zomm. Hope this helps whomever asked.

It IS available in the library in Erudin, that's where I bought mine. It's
on the third floor.
I didn't find much use for this spell however, except I want them all, it
looks nice, and it's our first conjuration spell I think.
It would be a good spell to go explore underwater areas, if only it lasted
longer. As it is, it didn't even last long enough to reach the bottom of
the sea at the end of the dock in Queynos.

Ramagh,
Fenin Ro.
